verses.verse: Vindicate <S%H8199><s%> me, O God, <S%H430><s%> and plead <S%H7378><s%> my case <S%H7379><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> an ungodly <S%H2623><s%> <S%H3808><s%> nation; <S%H1471><s%> O deliver <S%H6403><s%> me from the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and unjust <S%H9390><s%> man! <S%H376><s%>

For Thou art the God <S%H430><s%> of my strength; <S%H4581><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou rejected <S%H2186><s%> me? Why <S%H4100><s%> do I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H340><s%>?

O send <S%H7971><s%> out Thy light <S%H216><s%> and Thy truth, <S%H571><s%> let them lead <S%H5148><s%> me; Let them bring <S%H935><s%> me to Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill, <S%H2022><s%> And to Thy dwelling <S%H4908><s%> places. <S%H4908><s%>

Then I will go <S%H935><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> To God <S%H410><s%> my exceeding <S%H8057><s%> joy; <S%H8057><s%> And upon the lyre <S%H3658><s%> I shall praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee, O God, <S%H430><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? And why <S%H4100><s%> are you disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me? Hope <S%H3176><s%> in God, <S%H430><s%> for I shall again <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Him, The help <S%H3444><s%> of my countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
